org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.messaging

Class Request<RESPONSE_TYPE>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.messaging.Request<RESPONSE_TYPE>
  • Type Parameters:
    RESPONSE_TYPE - The class of the result returned after the Request operates on the target actor.

    public abstract class Request<RESPONSE_TYPE>
extends java.lang.Object
    Request instances are used for passing both 1-way and 2-way messages between actors. Requests are typically created as an anonymous class within the targeted Actor and are bound to that actor's mailbox. And rather than being sent immediately, request messages are buffered for improved throughput.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private static class  Request.CallResponseProcessor
      An instance of ResponseProcessor that is used as a place holder when the Request.call method is used.
      private static class  Request.Pender
      Pender is used by the Request.call method to block the current thread until a result is available and then either return the result or rethrow it if the result is an exception.
      private static class  Request.RequestMessage<RESPONSE_TYPE>
      The Message subclass used to pass requests and to return the results.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private MailboxBase mailbox
      The mailbox where this Request Objects is passed for processing.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Request(Mailbox _targetMailbox)
      Create an Request and bind it to its target mailbox.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RESPONSE_TYPE call()
      Passes this Request to the target Mailbox and blocks the current thread until a result is returned.
      Mailbox getMailbox()
      Returns the Mailbox to which this Request is bound and to which this Request is to be passed.
      abstract void processRequest(Transport<RESPONSE_TYPE> _transport)
      The processRequest method will be invoked by the target Mailbox on its own thread when the Request is dequeued from the target inbox for processing.
      void send(Mailbox _source, ResponseProcessor<RESPONSE_TYPE> _rp)
      Passes this Request together with the ResponseProcessor to the target Mailbox.
      void signal(Mailbox _source)
      Passes this Request to the target Mailbox without any result being passed back.

    • Field Detail

      • mailbox

        private final MailboxBase mailbox
        The mailbox where this Request Objects is passed for processing. The thread owned by this mailbox will process the Request.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Request

        public Request(Mailbox _targetMailbox)
        Create an Request and bind it to its target mailbox.
        Parameters:
        _targetMailbox - The mailbox where this Request Objects is passed for processing. The thread owned by this mailbox will process this Request.

    • Method Detail

      • getMailbox

        public Mailbox getMailbox()
        Returns the Mailbox to which this Request is bound and to which this Request is to be passed.
        Returns:
        The target Mailbox.

      • signal

        public void signal(Mailbox _source)
            throws java.lang.Exception
        Passes this Request to the target Mailbox without any result being passed back. I.E. The signal method results in a 1-way message being passed. If an exception is thrown while processing this Request, that exception is simply logged as a warning.
        Parameters:
        _source - The mailbox on whose thread this method was invoked and which will buffer this Request.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • send

        public void send(Mailbox _source,
        ResponseProcessor<RESPONSE_TYPE> _rp)
          throws java.lang.Exception
        Passes this Request together with the ResponseProcessor to the target Mailbox. Responses are passed back via the mailbox of the source actor and processed by the provided ResponseProcessor and any exceptions raised while processing the request are processed by the exception handler active when the send method was called.
        Parameters:
        _source - The mailbox on whose thread this method was invoked and which will buffer this Request and subsequently receive the result for processing on the same thread.
        _rp - Passed with this request and then returned with the result, the ResponseProcessor is used to process the result on the same thread that originally invoked this method.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • call

        public RESPONSE_TYPE call()
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Passes this Request to the target Mailbox and blocks the current thread until a result is returned.
        Returns:
        The result from applying this Request to the target actor.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the result is an exception, it is thrown rather than being returned.

      • processRequest

        public abstract void processRequest(Transport<RESPONSE_TYPE> _transport)
                             throws java.lang.Exception
        The processRequest method will be invoked by the target Mailbox on its own thread when the Request is dequeued from the target inbox for processing.
        Parameters:
        _transport - The Transport that is responsible for passing the result back to the originator of this Request.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
